name: HIPAA Compliance Policy - Sample Implementation
description: Sample HIPAA compliance policy demonstrating health information protection

requirements.title: Protected Health Information (PHI) Protection
requirements.description: Implement safeguards to protect PHI from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure
controls: 164.312(a)(1): Access Control - Implement technical policies and procedures for electronic information systems
remediation_steps: Deploy encryption for PHI at rest and in transit
Establish audit logging for PHI access

requirements.title: Security Risk Analysis
requirements.description: Conduct regular security risk analyses of ePHI systems
controls: 164.308(a)(1)(ii)(A): Risk Analysis - Conduct an accurate and thorough assessment
remediation_steps: Document identified risks and mitigation plans
Implement security controls based on risk assessment
Review and update risk assessments regularly

requirements.title: Business Associate Agreements
requirements.description: Establish and maintain business associate agreements with vendors
controls: 164.314(a): Business Associate Contracts - Written contracts required
164.504(e): Business Associate Contracts - Business associate obligations
remediation_steps: Review existing contracts for BAA requirements
Maintain BAA documentation and renewal schedules
